summary: GENOME ANNOUNCEMENT Rhinovirus C (RV-C) is a species of the Enterovirus (EV) genus in the Picornaviridae family of nonenveloped positive-sense RNA viruses. RV-C has been associated with more severe respiratory illness (3) than have RV-A and RV-B species. the complete genome sequence of RV-C was obtained from the specimen and typed as RV-C47 with the strain designation CA-RGDS-1001. the rhinovirus genome can be divided into one structural (P1-capsid) and two nonstructural (P2 and P3) regions.
